dialogue.text: you are not as strong as you once were (you are not the nightingale)
Home is where the house is, but the house won’t let me in.
That’s FINE because I KEPT a second KEY inside her skin}
I heard there was a secret chord, the secret’s spread too thin-
her tongue still tastes like arsenic//her bones are in the bin
Just a little further, Sensei. Once we get you into your room, everything will be okay.
I’m here for you. Just like I’ve always been. And I won’t let anyone ever hurt you again, no matter how much they want to.
Which they do, you know? Everyone always wants to hurt us because they don’t understand our relationship.
It’s jealousy. How could it be anything but that? Everyone wants what we have, so they go out of their way to try and confuse us.
They want us to believe this isn’t love at all. That it’s something called “circumstance.”
But such a thing does not exist.
God says that everything happens for a reason. So maybe you being hurt right now is what will bring us closer together? Maybe this can be a good thing?
On the bright side, at least Halloween is over now. And the temptation that came with seeing all of those girls in skimpy costumes has vanished just as quickly as candy kept in {b}BUCKETS.{/b}
The pumpkins have all been trashed and are just a day or two away from beginning to rot in landfills across the city while the two of {b}US{/b} return to form.
While the two of {b}US{/b} return to form.
While the two of {b}US{/b} return to form.
While the two of {b}US{/b} return to form.
But what “form” do you think that is?
And in the midst of this uncertainty, do you believe you will be able to close your eyes long enough to make out the shape of the proper silhouette?
What if I told you there was nothing? That this house, this city, and even the ground you walk upon will one day vanish like the girl you used to love?
Or what if it already has?
What if the world you see is only being seen because you want to see it and what there actually is to see is never seen at all because you’re seeing something seemingly unseen?
You could always reload an earlier save.
You could go back to {b}A TIME WHEN THINGS WERE HAPPIER{/b} and slowly saunter through those SENSEI-tional sexcapades until your manhood is reduced to pulp.
But if this game is not a game like the game-master says, and you do game-like things that result in a “game over” will you {s}game{/s} gain anything at all?

Are you just killing time when it all comes down to it? Shirking responsibilities and stretching out those tiny hands of yours in an attempt to reach a {b}FEELING{/b} you’ve been chasing your whole life?
Are you close?
Are you going to cum?
Are you going to cry?
Are you going to {b}CRY,{/i} you little bitch? Are you going to {b}FUCKING CRY?!{/b}
{b}MEN DON’T CRY. MEN ARE STRONG. FEELINGS ARE FOR FUCKING GIRLS. YOU SHOULD BE {i}FUCKING GIRLS.{/i} {/b}
{b}YOU’RE NOT A FUCKING PUSSY, ARE YOU? {i}ARE YOU?!{/i} STOP WHINING AND GO FUCK SOME GIRLS.{/b}
You poor thing. You must be tired after all you went through.
But that’s okay. You’re back now. {i}I’m{/i} back now. And everything you saw was only a dream.

But this? This is real, Sensei. {i}I’m{/i} real. Even if the house and the floor and the city all disappear, I won’t. And that’s a promise. A promise I’d only make to {i}you{/i} because {i}you’re{/i} special.
And anyone who tells you otherwise is lying.
Who are you going to trust? Them? Or me?
//////////////////CHECKING FOR NARRATION
//////////////////NARRATION NOT DETECTED. THIS ARCHIVE IS CORRUPT.
//////////////////SWITCHING TO “AUTO-PILOT” TO AVOID FURTHER CORRUPTION.
//////////////////SWITCH SUCCESSFUL
//////////////////PLEASE NOTE THAT RUNNING “AUTO-PILOT” MAY RESULT IN UNWANTED CHANGES TO YOUR FILES AND FOLLOWERS. DELETE THIS PROGRAM IN ITS ENTIRETY TO AVOID THIS OUTCOME.
//////////////////NOT DOING SO WILL ALLOW “AUTO-PILOT” TO MANIPULATE AND ENGAGE WITH THE STORY ON ITS OWN.
//////////////////THIS MAY RESULT IN UNEXPECTED BEHAVIOR OF CERTAIN CHARACTERS OR SETTINGS.
//////////////////PLEASE NOTE THAT “AUTO-PILOT” IS STILL BEING TESTED AND THAT VISUAL AND PHYSICAL INFIDELITY ARE TO BE EXPECTED.
//////////////////THANK YOU FOR PLAYING “LESSONS IN LOVE — A GAME ABOUT BEING HAPPY”
//////////////////“AUTO-PILOT” IS NOW {b}ON{/b}
Ami.
Yes, [amimaster]?
Fetch me my sanity-pack.
Yes, [amimaster].
Here you go, [amimaster]! These items will help keep you sane while you’re locked in here indefinitely.
Feel free to relieve yourself in the bucket and I’ll empty it out every hour on the hour.
I also brought you a towel and an onahole to take care of your more carnal desires if you’re still opposed to fucking me like you’re supposed to.
Why the long face, [amimaster]?
Wow, you must be in a {i}really{/i} bad spot if you’re not even going to respond on auto-pilot.
That’s okay, though! I’ve been waiting for an opportunity to do this again for a really long time now and I’ll be sure to make the best of it no matter {i}what{/i} condition you’re in!
I’m so excited, [amimaster]! Just think of all the uninterrupted time we’ll get to spend together now!
We can watch movies and cuddle and play video games and cuddle and eat lots of food and cuddle and take baths together and cuddle and you can even get me pregnant if you want!
That sounds fun, doesn’t it?
Teehee! No, {i}you’re{/i} the cutest thing in the whole wide world!
That reminds me, though — you have a lot more {i}acquaintances{/i} now than you had the last time you were broken. And stopping them all from trying to see you sounds like a pain.
I’ll have to put bars on your window. And install some extra locks on your door so it’s harder for people to break in.
Maybe I can find some security cameras online too? Those will probably help, I think. Especially with all those apps that let you monitor them from your phone nowadays.
Oh, and I can’t forget about the attic and your secret hiding place either. Gosh, I’ve got my work cut out for me, don’t I?
But you’ll help me, won’t you [amimaster]?!
I know it’s probably asking a lot of you right now, but I promise it won’t take much time at all! And it’ll keep you safe and happy, so it’ll be a worthwhile investment for sure!
I just need you to trust me completely and entirely because only I know what’s good for you and everyone else is an enemy! Okay?!
Great!
Then, I’ll be taking your phone now.
Yay! Now, you’re totally cut off from everyone who isn’t named Ami Arakawa and you don’t need to worry about responding to anyone’s messages while you’re grieving!
I’ll handle all of that for you! And I’ll also tell everybody that you want them to leave you alone for the indefinite future since you’re going to be here with me! Sound good?!
Really?! You mean that?!
Yeah! Of course I’m excited too!
{b}I’ll get started right away!{/b}

So...is there a {i}reason{/i} the two of you have been creepily staring at me for the last ten minutes? Because if you’ve got some kind of bad news to break to me or something, please just tell me now.
Maya...do you...
Do you remember...{i}anything?{/i} About me? Or...Sensei?...
What the fuck are you talking about?
Hah...
What Ayane means to say is — for the first time ever, you didn’t make it to the rooftop for an apparent apocalypse and-
Yeah, instead of just making up ridiculous stories, why not let Ayane explain what she means so I don’t wind up with an even bigger headache than I already have? Thanks.
Ugh...forget it. I barely even know what’s going on here in the first place.
Maya...how do you feel about Sensei?
Bad. Why?
How do you feel about {i}me?{/i}
Slightly...better? But again, {i}why?{/i}
Last question — how do you feel about the three of us starting a time traveling club that meets once every several months on top of the school rooftop?
Like that’s the most ridiculous idea for a club that I have ever heard and that you’re going to need a much better sales pitch if you want to actually recruit anyone.
Besides, I’m already in the manga club and-
Maya...listen to me. Your memories have been manipulated.
Excuse me?
Up until an hour ago, you were caught in a timeloop with Sensei and I that you’d been personally stuck in for so long that you stopped keeping track.
You should have opened with that before telling me what your weird club was about. That’s a much better pitch.
Maya, it’s not a pitch! I’m being serious! And it’s taking all I have to not start crying right now, so please at least try and be a little more considerate!
Fine. Sorry. I will stand here, waiting with bated-breath, as you rewrite my backstory right in front of me. Please proceed.
She {i}does{/i} seem a little...{i}sassier{/i} than normal, doesn’t she?
I was never {i}close{/i} with Maya by any means, but I’d be lying if I said I thought that this one and the one I knew a week ago were the same person based on attitude alone.
Question — am I invisible too? Or is Makoto just a bitch?
I suppose I’m a bit of a bitch.
Maya, I get that this sounds completely ridiculous. Even {i}I{/i} have a hard time accepting any of it and I’ve lived through a handful of apocalypses now — but you have to believe me.

You just had your mind reset after maybe thousands or...millions of years of being trapped in high school. {i}That’s{/i} why Sensei seemed so...broken just now...He misses you. He wants the old Maya back.
Sorry, but are you implying right now that he and I were somehow romantically involved with one another?

Yes. That is exactly what I’m implying. And it wasn’t just “involved.” You {i}loved{/i} each other. And you probably still do now, but...I don’t really understand all of the details about your...{i}relationship.{/i}
So...now that I’m no longer trapped in this apparent timeloop, the version of me he loved no longer exists? Which has forced him into whatever that catatonic state from earlier was?
It seems that way. But again-
Shut up, Makoto. I’m talking to Ayane right now.
Wow. Now {i}I{/i} want the old one back as well.

Yes, Maya. You were a major part of Sensei’s life. {i}Mine{/i} too. And the fact that you’re essentially a completely different person all of a sudden is like...it’s like we lost a loved one. Out of {i}nowhere.{/i}
It hurts.
Sure...but, on the other hand, I can’t imagine there is {i}any{/i} version of me that would have been happy to be caught up in a perpetual timeloop. That sounds fucking horrible.
So if any of this is true, which it’s not, shouldn’t you be {i}celebrating{/i} that I’ve somehow managed to escape such a terrible fate?
Specifically a fate where I am somehow romantically involved with our teacher — a thing that has definitely never happened before and will never happen ever because ew.
I sense a bit of deceit in those words, New-Maya.
And I sense a bit of jealousy in those ones, Bitch-Makoto.

Can you at least...try talking to Sensei about it? It can either be alone or...with me. I don’t care. I just can’t bear to see him like that, Maya. And if you really do care for him, I’m sure you feel the same.
I {i}don’t{/i} care for him and I {i}don’t{/i} feel the same, but...for the sake of getting you to stop spouting nonsense at me, fine. I’ll {i}talk{/i} to him.
But don’t say I’ve never done anything for you after this because I {i}hate{/i} talking. Feelings are stupid and people are stupid for having them.
Thank you...
I guess all that’s left now is waiting until the next time we see him.
You say that as if we won’t be seeing him tomorrow.
